from z3 import *

# N = 5, Mapping: 1 = first place, 5 = last place
Amy, Dan, Mya, Eli, Mel = Ints('Amy Dan Mya Eli Mel')
golfers = [Amy, Dan, Mya, Eli, Mel]

solver = Solver()
for g in golfers:
    solver.add(g >= 1, g <= 5)
solver.add(Distinct(golfers))

# "above" in golf = better rank = smaller number
solver.add(Amy < Mel)

# "first" → position 1
solver.add(Mya == 1)

# "below" in golf = worse rank = bigger number
solver.add(Amy > Eli)

# "last" → position N = 5
solver.add(Dan == 5)

if solver.check() == sat:
    m = solver.model()
    amy_pos = m.eval(Amy).as_long()
    dan_pos = m.eval(Dan).as_long()
    mya_pos = m.eval(Mya).as_long()
    eli_pos = m.eval(Eli).as_long()
    mel_pos = m.eval(Mel).as_long()
    
    # "first" → position 1
    if amy_pos == 1: print("A")
    elif dan_pos == 1: print("B")
    elif mya_pos == 1: print("C")
    elif eli_pos == 1: print("D")
    elif mel_pos == 1: print("E")
else:
    print("Error: Unsatisfiable")
